name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training
display_help: You compliment your abilities with training in the secret art of the Ninja. You have mastered valuable ninja tools, poisons and weapons, including the deadly Ninja Blade. You also mastered the harmonic powers of Kuji-In Toh, allowing you to regenerate and recover endurance at an accelerated rate.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Immobilizing_Dart
powers.display_help: Immobilizing Darts do minor toxic damage over time and weakens your foe's legs. They will either be entirely unable to move, or severely slowed down. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 4 ticks of 6.26 toxic damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
-30.00% strength to jump height for 18s on target
-30.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 18s on target
-30.00% strength to recharge for 18s on target
9.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Sting_of_the_Wasp
powers.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
7.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.67s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Choking_Powder
powers.display_help: Toss a fistful of toxic powder at an enemys face. This powder will temporarily close the affected foes throat making them choke and struggle to grasp for air. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info: 5 ticks of 13.76 toxic damage over 4.2s on target
5 ticks of 27.52 toxic damage over 4.2s on target
7.10% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.57s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Kyokan
powers.display_help: A shinobi is a master of stealth and assassination. While this power is active you will be very hard to detect, and your first strike out of the shadows will deal extra damage. Even If you manage to regain cover, you can only inflict this surprise attack once every 30 seconds. Even while detected, a shinobi is a deadly foe and able to deal slightly higher damage . This power cant be used at the same time as other stealth powers. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), +Run Speed, +Jump

display_info: 1.75% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.The_Lotus_Drops
powers.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 3 ticks of 6.67 lethal damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay
-7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
5.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.33s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Kuji-In_Toh
powers.display_help: Kuji-In Toh invokes the power of Toh, or harmony with the universe. Focusing your inner power, you can make your body regenerate and recover endurance for a while. You also gain resistance to psionic attacks and fear protection. Recharge: Long

display_info: 7.00% resistance to psionic damage for 3m 30s on self
83.04% resistance to terrorize for 3m 30s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Smoke_Flash
powers.display_help: You throw a smoke bomb at your feet. The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. Enemies will be distracted and confused, making them more vulnerable to attacks for a short time. Recharge: Long

display_info: -10.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 15s on target
3.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.33s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ninja_Training.Blinding_Powder
powers.display_help: You throw a handful of Blinding powder in a wide arc at your foes. Most foes will be blinded, and unable to see. Some affected targets may be overcome by the powder that they may start attacking their own allies. If you attack the blinded foes, they will be alerted to your presence, but will continue to suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack
display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 25 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

powers.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
